testSites.name: Indian Wells Testing Center
testSites.days: Thursday, Friday
testSites.description: Appointments can be made by calling 800-945-6171, and results normally take two to four days to come back. The drive-up testing center is set up at Southwest Church in Indian Wells at 44-175 Washington St.

testSites.name: LVHN COVID-19 Testing Center Richland Township
testSites.days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
testSites.description: You must receive guidance via the MyLVHN Nurse Information line at 1-888-402-LVHN or complete an LVHN Video Visit by downloading the MyLVHN app to be assessed and possibly tested. When you arrive at the Assess and Test office, go inside and check in with the registration desk. You will be asked to provide your mobile phone number. Then you can return to your car and wait until the Assess and Test office calls your mobile phone, letting you know you can be seen.

testSites.name: New Rochelle Testing Center
testSites.hours: Monday - Friday at 8AM to 6PM and 9AM to 3PM Saturday to Sunday
testSites.days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
testSites.description: In Partnership with Northwell and BioReference, Mobile Testing Center Will Test up to 200 People Today and up to 500 People per Day in the Coming Days. New Rochelle Residents Should Call 888-364-3065 to Make an Appointment at Mobile Testing Center.
